get.description: Gets all expense itemizations owned by the user.

parameters.name: reportID
parameters.description: The report ID of the itemizations to be retrieved. Use the GET /expense/reportdigests function to find the report ID. Format: An alpha-numeric string

parameters.name: entryID
parameters.description: The entry ID for the itemizations to be retrieved. Use the GET /expense/entries endpoint to learn the valid entry ID.

parameters.name: expenseTypeCode
parameters.description: The expense type code for the itemizations to be retrieved.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value: 25

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user who owns the itemizations. The user must have the Web Services Admin role to use this parameter.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The expense itemization object to create.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user who owns the itemizations. The user must have the Web Services Admin role to use this parameter.

get.summary: Get a single expense itemization by ID
get.description: Gets an expense itemization by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the expense itemization.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user who owns the itemizations. The user must have the Web Services Admin role to use this parameter.

put.summary: Update an expense itemization by ID
put.description: Updates the specified expense itemization. Only the fields provided in the supplied object are updated. Missing fields will not be altered.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the expense itemization.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The partial or complete expense itemization object to update.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user who owns the itemizations. The user must have the Web Services Admin role to use this parameter.

delete.summary: Delete an expense itemization by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the expense itemization to delete.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user who owns the itemizations. The user must have the Web Services Admin role to use this parameter.

Code.description: For list fields, this is the list item code.

ListItemID.description: For list fields, this is the list item ID.

Type.description: The custom field type. Possible values: Amount, Boolean, ConnectedList, Date, Integer, List, Number, Text

Value.description: The value in the Org Unit or Custom field. For list fields, this is the name of the list item.  Maximum length: 48 characters

NextPage.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.

AllocationType.description: The type of allocation for the itemization. Possible values: P - partial allocation, F - full allocation, N - no allocation. Use the GET /expense/allocations function to get information about this entry's allocations.

ApprovedAmount.description: The approved amount of the expense itemization, in the report currency.

Description.description: The description of the expense. Maximum length: 64 characters

EntryID.description: The ID of the expense entry that is the parent for the itemization. Use the GET /expense/entries endpoint to learn the entry ID for the expense itemizations.

ExpenseTypeCode.description: The code for the expense type. Use the GET /expense/expensegroupconfigurations endpoint to learn the expense type code for expense types that are active for this report's policy.

ExpenseTypeName.description: The name of the expense type, localized to the user's language.

HasComments.description: Indicates whether the expense has comments. Use the GET ExpenseEntryComments endpoint to get information about this entry's comments. Format: true or false

HasExceptions.description: Indicates whether the expense has exceptions. Format: true or false

ID.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

IsBillable.description: Indicates whether the itemization is billable. Format: true or false

IsImageRequired.description: Indicates whether a receipt image is required for the entry. Format: true or false

IsPersonal.description: Indicates whether the itemization is personal (that is, non-reimbursable). Format: true or false

LastModified.description: The UTC date when the itemization was last modified.

LocationCountry.description: The country where the expense was incurred. Format: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code

LocationID.description: The unique identifier for the location where the expense was incurred. Use the GET /common/locations function to get information for this location.

LocationName.description: The location where the expense was incurred, usually the city name.

LocationSubdivision.description: The state, province, or other country subdivision where the expense was incurred. Format: ISO 3166-2:2007 country subdivision

PostedAmount.description: The amount of the expense itemization, in the report currency.

ReportID.description: The ID of the report that is the parent for the itemization. Use the GET /expense/reportdigests endpoint to learn the report ID for the itemizations.

ReportOwnerID.description: The login ID for the report owner. Use the GET User Information endpoint to learn details about this user.

SpendCategoryCode.description: The code for the spending category that is specified for this itemization.

SpendCategoryName.description: The name of the spending category that is specified for this itemization, localized to the user's language.

TransactionAmount.description: The amount of the expense itemization, in the transaction currency of the parent expense entry.

TransactionDate.description: The date when the good or service associated with this itemization was provided. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

Comment.description: The expense itemization comment. Maximum length: 500 characters

Custom1.description: The details from the Custom fields. These fields may not have data, depending on the configuration. If the form field is configured as a List data type, the value will be the item code for this list. Use the GET /common/listitems operation to learn the item name. Maximum length: 64 characters

If the form field is configured as a List data type, the value will be the item code for this list. Use the GET /common/listitems operation to learn the item name. Maximum length: 64 characters

TransactionAmount.description: The amount of the expense itemization, in the transaction currency of the parent expense entry.

TransactionDate.description: The date when the good or service associated with this itemization was provided. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

HasValue.description: Indicates whether the itemization is personal (that is, non-reimbursable). Format: true or false
